thread.title: BRIEF-Agricultural Bank Of China ‍Board Approves Dividend Payment Scheme Of 2017-2018 For Second Tranche Of Preference Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Agricultural Bank Of China ‍Board Approves Dividend Payment Scheme Of 2017-2018 For Second Tranche Of Preference Shares

organizations.name: reuters) - agricultural bank of china ltd

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Agricultural Bank Of China Ltd :
* ‍ON MONDAY, 12 MARCH 2018 BANK WILL PAY CASH DIVIDENDS OF RMB5.50 PER PREFERENCE SHARE​
* BOARD CONSIDERED AND APPROVED FIXED ASSETS INVESTMENT BUDGET OF BANK FOR 2018
* BOARD CONSIDERED AND APPROVED DIVIDEND PAYMENT SCHEME OF 2017-2018 FOR SECOND TRANCHE OF PREFERENCE SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
